About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Lydia Michael Smeets I am a graduate of Codaisseur Academy for full-stack web development. My previous background is in sales and teaching, in both those fields I developed communicative skills and leadership skills. But I decided to make a change and pursuit my dream to learn how to code. It was something that I always wanted to learn, because the bootcamp was fulltime I had to balance being a mother and student. I had to manage my time between my studies and my son, this was hard but I managed it, resulting in my graduation from the bootcamp. Now I am searching for a position as a junior web developer, where I can grow as a professional and a person.

Codaisseur Academy

Full Stack Developer

I applied to Codaisseur academy the Netherlands number one bootcamp. To become eligible I had to take a test and I passed, only 35% of applicants do. I followed the bootcamp for eleven weeks, where I learned a lot of new technologies in a very short amount of time (please check my Github for examples). My final assignment was to build a full stack app in only four days and of course I passed.

Mazsol Group

Brand representative

Mazsol Group is an umbrella company which offers products from a range of beauty brands as their representative I was responsible for: - Booking booth spaces at trade shows - Setting up stand space - Keep track of product stock - Designing promotional material - Setting up and maintenance of website - Marketing - Customer contact - Social media

Seacret Spa

Sales Manager

Seacret Spa is a luxury beauty brand that specializes in products made with ingriendients from the deadsea. At Seacret Spa I started as a sales employee and grew to a manager position in six months. My typical duties where: - Managing and assessing the team of sales people and (shop) employees - Stock management and purchasing policy - Be present on the work floor when needed - Optimize the sales results - Reporting and advice to higher management - Improve / maintain the efficiency of work processes - Taking care of administration, planning and schedules
